desc: The Official Online Store for Dr. Mae Jemison 1st woman of color in space, Astronaut, Physician, Engineer, Educator, Futurist, Leader of 100 YearStarship, Area Peace Corps Medical Officer. Don't doubt, dare!

layout.text:
The only official website for merchandise inspired by
and approved by Dr. Mae – NASA astronaut, first
woman of color in the world in space, physician,
engineer, educator and advocate.
